title: You Want to Know Why I Love You
message: I love you because you are you. You are the first person look and not wanting to change anything about him. You are the person I can't wait to grow with. I love you.

title: You Miss Me
message: Proverbs 13:12: “Hope deferred makes the heart sick, but a desire fulfilled is a tree of life.”

title: I’m Driving You Crazy
message: I don't know what I am doing but probably I am not admitting I am wrong. Just know that 99.9999% I know it so I act like I'm innocent. It probably will go away when I start thinking about it. Good news is this card gives you a 1 HOUR FULL BODY MASSAGE. Have fun with it, I can’t wait to annoy you forever and ever…

title: You Are Stressed
message: 10 DEEP BREATHS NOW. Okay, we can continue. I'm so sorry that you feel stressed right now Angel. I don't know who or what did this to you but we'll get through it. I really wish I was there to give you the biggest hug and kisses and make you lay on my butt. Whatever that is we'll work through it, you are not alone. I love you.

title: You Are Worried About Our Future
message: As someone who is constantly worried about our future I don't know how much I can help but I can tell you what whatever it is it'll pass. I guess I can comfort you by letting you know that I think I’ll always know I made the right choice with you in my life.

title: You Need a Hug
message: I know the feeling dude, as someone constantly wants be in your arms. I am editing this one because yesterday you said I wish you were 1' so I could carry you anywhere. I can't believe I am saying this but I want it. I don't know what made you feel that way

title: You Need to Hear a Compliment
You Need Some Motivation
message: Beautiful, I don't know what you are struggling right now but I am here to remind you how brilliant you are. Even if you don't believe in yourself you have someone constantly have faith in everything you do. So whatever that is, go kill it because I know you can. Just know that I'll always be here cheering on you. YOU GOT THIS GO GORGEOUS GOOOO

title: When I'm There
message: I feel like this will be helpful for you because you'll need to learn how to live with me. First of all, the kitchen will constantly smell coffee, sorry in advance but I'll make some for you too whenever you want. Sometimes I stay in the bathroom for 6 minutes... I constantly sing, at best I sing internally so you might see me dancing to anything
